skilllist.skilldesc: Each skill cast adds a rune to Gusion's dagger (stacks up to 4 times). Each stack enhances Gusion's next Basic Attack to deal additional damage equal to 3% of the target's Max HP and restore 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to himself.

Gusion throws a dagger in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and marking them.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Gusion moves behind the marked enemy, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to them. This skill cannot be interrupted while Gusion is moving behind the marked enemy.

Gusion throws a volley of daggers in the target direction, each dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 6% for 2s (when hit by multiple daggers, the slow effect can stack up to 30%).

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Gusion recalls the daggers, each dealing 65<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path.

Gusion dashes to the target location, resetting the cooldowns of <font color="a6aafb">Sword Spike</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Shadowblade Slaughter</font>. If <font color="a6aafb">Shadowblade Slaughter</font> was cast once before the reset, Gusion can throw another five daggers on his next <font color="a6aafb">Shadowblade Slaughter</font> cast, and recall a total of ten daggers afterward.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Gusion dashes a short distance in the target direction.

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equiptips:
+45 Adaptive Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.

recommendmasterplan.name: Mano Gaming
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

assist.desc: Gusion works well with heroes with strong opening CC, which will allow him to hit the target more easily with his 1st Skill, such as Vexana and Pharsa.

strong.desc: Gusion is strong against squishy heroes who lack movement abilities, so that Gusion can easily chase them down. Like Layla and Hanabi.

weak.desc: Gusion is countered by tank heroes with good single-target CC. Once controlled by them, Gusion will have a hard time escaping. Such as Franco and Kaja.
